DOC.brief_title: FLU A+B Nasal Swab Clinical Study
DOC.detailed_description: Patients exhibit symptom influenza enrolled fashion confidentiality personal health information maintain . No patient treatment affect enrollment trial .
DOC.criteria: Male Female age group Patients exhibit influenza symptom ( i.e. , fever , body ache , headache , cough , sore throat , respiratory symptom ) time examination Patients must either present fever ( > 100ºF ; > 37.8ºC ) time examination fever ( > 100ºF ; > 37.8ºC ) declare time examination fever within previous 3 day prior examination Must able collect sample use nasal swab sample type Patients fever time examination within 3 day prior examination and/or currently undergo treatment ( include antiviral ) exclude study .
